sentences.en: Both firms are based in Kent.
sentences.cn: 两个公司的总部都设在肯特市。

sentences.en: He mounted the bicycle and headed for the Old Kent Road.
sentences.cn: 他骑上车子向老肯特路骑去.

sentences.en: His paper was published in the proceedings of the Kent Archaeological Society.
sentences.cn: 他的论文已在肯特考古学会学报上发表.

sentences.en: I quite like Kent's four rules.
I'd like to see Mr. Kent on Tuesday afternoon.
sentences.cn: 我想星期二下午和肯特先生会面.

sentences.en: Kent is known as'the garden of England '.
sentences.cn: 肯特以“英格兰的花园 ” 而驰名.

sentences.en: Kent is the garden of England.
sentences.cn: 肯特郡是英格兰的肥田沃地.

sentences.en: Kent must be kept out of this affair. He'll interfere and tries to have an oar in everyman's boat.
sentences.cn: 这事可不能让肯特参与. 他一定会横加干涉,乱管闲事.

sentences.en: Kent's going for the tennis championship this year.
sentences.cn: 肯特竭力想获得今年的网球冠军.

sentences.en: Mr. Yang, Mr. Kent will be here at 3 o'clock on Tuesday as you asked.
sentences.cn: 杨先生, 肯特先生将按你说的星期二下午3点钟来这里.

sentences.en: Prince Michael of Kent presented the prizes.
sentences.cn: 肯特亲王迈克尔颁发了奖品。

sentences.en: The broken leg finished Kent off as an athlete.
sentences.cn: 这条断腿使肯特结束了运动员生涯.

sentences.en: The most extraordinary safari I ever organised for Abercrombie and Kent was in 1993 when I took Bill and Melinda Gates round East Africa.
sentences.cn: 我为阿伯克龙比和肯特组织的最特别的猎游是1993年的时候，当时我带比尔盖茨夫妇去东非。

sentences.en: They had lost their way on a community hike somewhere in Kent.
sentences.cn: 有次去肯特参加集体野游,他们走丢了.

sentences.en: This picture was knocked down to Mr. Kent for a hundred dollars.
sentences.cn: 这幅画以一百元降价卖给肯特先生.

sentences.en: Would you put me through to Mr. Kent, Room 608, please?
